org.jooby.apitool.raml

Class Raml

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jooby.apitool.raml.Raml

  • public class Raml
extends Object
    RAML objects for describing a RAML definition file. This is a partial representation of the RAML specification.
    Since:
    1.2.0
    Author:
    edgar

      • path

        public RamlPath path(String pattern)
        Get a path for the given pattern. If the path doesn't exist, a new path will be created.
        Parameters:
        pattern - Pattern.
        Returns:
        Path for the given pattern.

      • define

        public RamlType define(Type javaType,
                       RamlType baseType)
        Define/map a custom Java type to RAML type. 
           RamlType uuid = raml.define(UUID.class, RamlType.STRING);
   uuid.setPattern("...");
        Parameters:
        javaType - Java type.
        baseType - RAML base type.
        Returns:
        New RAML type.

      • define

        public RamlType define(Type type)
        Register a Java type and produces an equivalent RAML type. It returns an existing RAML type if the Java type was registered already.
        Parameters:
        type - Java type.
        Returns:
        RAML type.

      • setResources

        public void setResources(Map<String,RamlPath> resources)
        Set RAML paths.
        Parameters:
        resources - RAML paths.

      • toYaml

        public String toYaml()
              throws IOException
        Convert this RAML object to Yaml.
        Returns:
        Yaml string.
        Throws:
        IOException - If something goes wrong.

      • build

        public static Raml build(Raml base,
                         List<RouteMethod> routes)
        Build a Raml object from list of RouteMethod.
        Parameters:
        base - Base raml (might be null).
        routes - List of routes.
        Returns:
        RAML object.
